title: Logitech N315 Portable Lapdesk (Fuchsia Burst)
description: You love your notebook. It gives you the freedom to work, play and stay connected anywhere. But balancing it on your lap can leave you cramped, overheated, and without a work surface to use your mouse. That's where the Logitech Portable Lapdesk comes in. This ingenious little on-the-go lapdesk shields your lap from notebook heat. So you stay cool and comfortable, even during marathon notebook sessions on the couch, campus steps, or seat at the airport gate. And thanks to the retractable mouse pad, now your can use your mouse without having to sit at a desk or table. Leave it to Logitech to bring the laptop back where it was meant to be-your lap.
